Xenotechnologist.

A human being should be able to change a diaper, plan an invasion, butcher a hog, conn a ship, design a building, write a sonnet, balance accounts, build a wall, set a bone, comfort the dying, take orders, give orders, cooperate, act alone, solve equations, analyze a new problem, pitch manure, program a computer, cook a tasty meal, fight efficiently, die gallantly. Specialization is for insects.

-Robert A. Heinlein

Uploaded Xen 3.0.2 packages to revu:
http://revu.tauware.de/details.py?upid=2308

Wrote a guide for Xen 3.0.2 under Dapper:
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/XenVirtualMachine/XenOnUbuntuDapper

Submitted patch for kernel-package to properly support the xen subarch of xen3.0.2:
https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/kernel-package/+bug/40088

Provided a draft spec for xen-enabled-kernel for edgy:
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/XenEnabledKernelDraft
